document_data.caption: A map showing Tharleon Street and surroundings in the Castle Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Tharleon Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Tharleon Street''' was a road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Tharleon Street ran east to west within the northern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]]. The road originated in the east at the intersection of [[Bazaar Street]] and the [[Street of Silver]] where it branched west to terminate near [[Blackstaff Tower]] on [[Swords Street]] after several blocks. Other streets connecting with Tharleon Street included the [[Street of Silks]], [[Siren Lane]], and [[Aka Way]].
